# NOREPAIR_UDP (checksum not 0, but written as 0 (unused))
Packet
be14 8815 6600 1c6f  6582 fcde 0800 4500
004c d7e9 4000 4011  dea0 c0a8 0106 c0a8
01c0 b662 007b 0038  0000 e300 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 1ed7 3112 4c94
6371 1fd7 3112 4c94  6371 3766 80f3
FinPacket

Empty
Sleep

# This packet is crafted to have a 0 (correct) checksum,
# stored as 0 (can be mistaken as unused checksum).
Packet
be14 8815 6600 1c6f  6582 fcde 0800 4500
004c d7e9 4000 4011  dea0 c0a8 0106 c0a8
01c0 b662 007b 0038  0000 e300 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 e0aa 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 1ed7 3112 4c94
6371 1fd7 3112 4c94  6371 c68d d025
FinPacket

Empty
Sleep

# NOREPAIR_UDP
# This packet is crafted to have a 0 checksum, stored
# as ffff (to not be mistaken for unused checksum).
Packet
be14 8815 6600 1c6f  6582 fcde 0800 4500
004c d7e9 4000 4011  dea0 c0a8 0106 c0a8
01c0 b662 007b 0038  ffff e300 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 e0aa 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 1ed7 3112 4c94
6371 1fd7 3112 4c94  6371 ddde 504d
FinPacket

Empty
Sleep

# Intentionally wrong IP and UDP length.
# Should give no response.
# NOREPAIR_UDP (since repair reads into the crc)
Packet
be14 8815 6600 1c6f  6582 fcde 0800 4500
0050 d7e9 4000 4011  de9c c0a8 0106 c0a8
01c0 b662 007b 003c  e0a2 e300 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 0000 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 1ed7 3112 4c94
6371 1fd7 3112 4c94  6371 d13a dec2
FinPacket

Empty
Sleep
